tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM github.get_members_of_team
  WHERE teamId=22306276
  -- The following parameters have been populated with suggested values
  AND Accept='application/vnd.github.v3+json'

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM github.get_team
  WHERE teamId=<required_integer>
  -- The following parameters have been populated with suggested values
  AND Accept='application/vnd.github.v3+json'

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM github.get_org
  WHERE org='transposit'
  -- The following parameters have been populated with suggested values
  AND Accept='application/vnd.github.v3+json'

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM github.list_teams_for_repo
  WHERE owner='transposit'
  AND repo='transposit'
  -- The following parameters have been populated with suggested values
 -- AND Accept='application/vnd.github.v3+json'
  LIMIT 10

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM github.list_contributors_to_repo
  WHERE owner='transposit'
  AND repo='transposit'
